alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Red River; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:03AM CDT until June 26 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 802 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Coushatta to 15 miles southwest of Jonesboro, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Coushatta, Campti, Martin, Clarence, Goldonna, Ashland, Edgefield, Atlanta, Powhatan, Lake End, Grand Ecore, Grand Bayou, Hanna, St. Maurice, Black Lake, Chestnut, Clear Lake, Creston and Armistead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
